name: 0 Heaven
description:
0 Heaven is a rotary rogue-like. Dodge walls and kill enemies to earn awesome gears! You can play with pad or keyboard. You play as girl who fly to Heaven to bring back her dad. It's a mix between KuruKuru Kururin and Binding of Isaac. Created during the #indiesvspewdiepie game jam in 2014.

Credits:

- Adrien Carta

- Lisa Maurer

- Grégoire Carabeufs

- Louis Cabrera

- Christophe Galati
